alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 01 at 11:38AM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Power may be impacted in some locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard or near-blizzard conditions may be possible. Small fluctuations in storm track are expected over the next 24 hours which will impact precipitation type and amount forecast.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock
